title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.31 - Request for approval of distance learning programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.31 - Request for approval of distance learning programs

State Regulations

Applications for approval to conduct distance learning
courses of study shall be made on an application prescribed by the Department
60 days before the proposed course is to be conducted. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
